title: South Carolina City To Pay $6.5 Million Settlement For Fatally Shooting Walter Scott
text: NORTH CHARLESTON, S.C. (AP) â€” A city in South Carolina approved a $6.5 million settlement Thursday with the family of an unarmed black man shot to death earlier this year by a white police officer. The North Charleston City Council approved
